TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義常數，指出內容是否會從 控制項複製到剪貼簿中。

span.span: Defines constants that indicate whether content is copied from a control to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別由屬性，指出使用者是否可以將選取的資料格的文字值複製到剪貼簿，以及是否會包含資料列和資料行的標頭文字。This enumeration is used by the property to indicate whether users can copy the text values of selected cells to the Clipboard and whether row and column header text is included. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用複製控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 完整的範例，請參閱[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/CS/datagridviewclipboarddemo.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/VB/datagridviewclipboarddemo.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode Disable = int32(0)

summary.span: 複製到剪貼簿的功能已停用。

span.span: Copying to the Clipboard is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode EnableAlwaysIncludeHeaderText = int32(3)

summary.span: 選取儲存格的文字值可以複製到剪貼簿中。

span.span: The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 而且，會針對包含選取儲存格的資料列與資料行包括其行首文字。

span.span: Header text is included for rows and columns that contain selected cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode EnableWithAutoHeaderText = int32(1)

summary.span: 選取儲存格的文字值可以複製到剪貼簿中。

span.span: The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.

summary.span: 不過，只有當 屬性設定為 或 ，而且至少選取一個行首時，才會針對包含選取儲存格的資料列或資料行包括其資料列或資料行行首文字。

span.span: Row or column header text is included for rows or columns that contain selected cells only when the property is set to or and at least one header is selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode EnableWithoutHeaderText = int32(2)

summary.span: 選取儲存格的文字值可以複製到剪貼簿中。

span.span: The text values of selected cells can be copied to the Clipboard.
